summary: Email from a USAFIS official regarding a draft letter to victims notifying them of Jeffrey Epstein's work release. The sender asks for objections to the language and indicates they will fill in blanks the next day.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the work release notification being drafted for victims.

events.title: Drafting of Work Release Notification
events.description: An official drafts a letter to notify victims of Jeffrey Epstein's work release and seeks feedback on the language.

keyFacts: A draft letter was being prepared to notify victims of Jeffrey Epstein's work release.
The email was sent on December 4, 2008, from a USAFIS official.
The sender requested objections to the language of the draft notification.
The document indicates official communication regarding Epstein's status during his legal proceedings.
